title: Celestial Empress Awakening
caption: A radiant empress emerges from the shadows, her aura pulsing with divine energy and ethereal power.
style: Hyper-realistic ethereal fantasy with glowing violet energy, divine elegance, and spiritual intensity
character_placement: Centered tightly in the frame, head and upper torso taking up most of the space
character_size: Large and imposing, dominating the foreground with a powerful presence
character_facing: Directly forward-facing, locking eyes with the viewer
dimensionality: Deep 3D realism with ultra-smooth shading and subtle bloom around illuminated elements
art_profile: Fantasy realism with magical glow effects, high detail skin and hair rendering, and an aura of mysticism
